pages.text: Runic dust can be obtained by grinding $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$() in a $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)mortar$().$(br2)The resulting dust retains much of the magic of runestone and is used as an ingredient in spells, rituals and other crafts.$(br2)$(info) As many as five pieces of runestone can be crushed at a time, or as few as one.
